basic.description: Provides a foundation for critical thinking and decision making approaches used by nurses in health related client situations.  Introduces core community health concepts including health, health promotion, disease prevention, primary health care, and health education. Discusses selected legal and ethical issues and decision making frameworks. 3 hours lecture per week; 9 units (3 credits) course weight.
basic.subject: NURS
basic.title: Intr To Promoting Dec Mkg Hlth
